hero.title: UN Youth Delegates
hero.subtitle: Albania 2026
hero.description: Join the prestigious UN Youth Delegate program and represent Albania at the United Nations General Assembly.

alert.title: Applications for 2025 are closed
alert.description: Applications for the 2026 UN Youth Delegate Program will open at the beginning of 2025. Register to be notified when the application process begins.

program.title: About the Program
program.subtitle: The UN Youth Delegate Program enables young Albanians to participate in diplomatic processes and represent our country on the international stage.

diplomatic.title: Diplomatic Experience
diplomatic.description: Learn diplomatic protocol and the art of international negotiations

training.title: Comprehensive Training
training.description: Intensive preparation in diplomatic protocol and global issues

network.title: Global Network
network.description: Connect with delegates from around the world and build lasting relationships

skills.title: Professional Development
skills.description: Learn new skills that will help you in your future career

mission.title: Aligned with UNA Albania's mission
mission.inform: Information: Raising youth awareness about global issues and the role of the UN
mission.inspire: Inspiration: Motivating young people to contribute to solving international problems
mission.mobilize: Mobilization: Active involvement of youth in diplomatic processes and policy-making

delegates2024.title: 2024 Delegates - 79th UN General Assembly
delegates2024.name: Albanian Delegates 2024
delegates2024.videoDescription: Watch the Albanian delegates' speech at the 79th UN General Assembly

callToAction.title: Want to Become the Next Delegate?
callToAction.description: Applications for youth delegates for 2026 will open soon. Prepare for an unforgettable experience at the UN!

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Our delegates have achieved great things after their UN experience

speeches.title: Youth Delegate Speeches Through the Years
speeches.subtitle: Discover inspiring speeches and presentations by youth delegates from Albania and around the world

banner.title: 2024 Speech Now Available!
banner.description: Watch the 2024 Albanian delegates' speech on Facebook! For other historical speeches, contact UNA Albania at

contribute.title: Want to Contribute?
contribute.description: If you have recordings of Albanian delegate speeches or other materials that can be shared, contact us to add them to our archive.

socialMedia.title: Join Our Community
socialMedia.description: Follow partner organizations and stay informed about all news, activities, and new opportunities.

preparation.title: Prepare for 2026
preparation.subtitle: Start preparing today to be the ideal candidate for the 2026 UN Youth Delegate Program. Here's what you need to do during the coming year.

language.title: Improve Language Skills
language.description: Prepare in English and French - the official languages of the UN

politics.title: Study International Politics
politics.description: Develop deep knowledge of global issues and the role of the UN

experience.title: Develop Practical Experience
experience.description: Gain experience in organizations working on international issues

network.title: Build Professional Network
network.description: Connect with specialists in international affairs and former delegates

ready.title: Ready to start preparing?
ready.description: Register to receive notifications and the first preparation materials.

footer.description: The UN Youth Delegate Program in Albania enables young Albanians to represent our country on the international stage.

newsletter.title: Stay informed for 2026
newsletter.description: Register to receive early notifications when applications open for 2026.
